channel.title: Fundamental Research in Natural Sciences Seminar
channel.description: Weekly seminars on physics, mathematics, and complex systems.

item.title: Talk: Yixin Ma - Topological Phases through Tensor-Network States
item.description: Speaker: Yixin Ma (KITS, CAS). Topic: Unveiling 2D Correlated Topological Phases through Tensor-Network States.

item.title: Talk: Ruby Wei - High-Distance Error-Correcting Codes
item.description: Speaker: Ruby Wei (University of Colorado, Boulder). Topic: High-Distance Error-Correcting Codes for Fermion-to-Qubit Mappings in 2D and 3D.

item.title: Lecture: Hongpeng Zhao - Basic Knowledge of Quantum Error Correction
item.description: Speaker: Hongpeng Zhao (Nankai University). Topic: Basic Knowledge of Quantum Error Correction.

item.title: Talk: Xuanpu Yang - Localized Transition of Disordered Systems
item.description: Speaker: Xuanpu Yang (ICQM, Peking University). Topic: Localized Transition of Disordered Systems under Quantum Dissipation.
